# Lead Funnel Analytics Project

## Project Type
React + Vite landing page with Google Analytics 4 integration

## Status
✅ Project Complete

- [x] Scaffold Vite React project
- [x] Create components and styling
- [x] Implement GA4 integration
- [x] Setup environment variables
- [x] Install dependencies
- [x] Create documentation
- [x] Launch development server

**Dev server running at:** http://localhost:5173/

**Next Steps:**
1. Add your GA4 Measurement ID to `.env` file
2. Test the funnel (page view → CTA click → form submit)
3. Verify events in GA4 DebugView
